title: Jack Davies (screenwriter)
text:
Jack Davies (25 November 1913 – 22 June 1994), born John Davies, was an <a href="England">English</a> <a href="screenwriter">screenwriter</a>, producer, editor and actor.
Davies was a prolific comedy screenwriter. His 48 credits include films starring comedians <a href="Will%20Hay">Will Hay</a> and <a href="Norman%20Wisdom">Norman Wisdom</a>. He was nominated for an <a href="Academy%20Award">Oscar</a> for his work on "<a href="Those%20Magnificent%20Men%20in%20Their%20Flying%20Machines">Those Magnificent Men in Their Flying Machines</a>".
His eldest son <a href="John%20Howard%20Davies">John Howard Davies</a> was a successful child actor and <a href="BBC">BBC</a> television executive.
